A widespread chocolate recall raises consumer alerts due to potential contamination risks.

2025-06-21.finance:
Cryptocurrencies show minimal changes during quiet weekend trading. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) holds steady at $103,328.65 with a 0.02% gain. Ethereum (ETH-USD), Solana (SOL-USD), and XRP (XRP-USD) see slight declines of less than 1%, trading at $2,404.36, $138.93, and $2.10 respectively. Traditional stock markets remain closed.

2025-06-21.overall: Sports events dominate today’s trends, with Game 7 of the NBA Finals and multiple MLB matchups drawing attention. Weather-related alerts and food safety recalls warrant monitoring for public safety impacts. Cryptocurrencies remain stable with marginal fluctuations; investors should watch for Monday’s traditional market reopen for broader financial signals.
